head.foreign: copia littere assedacionis inferioris molendini facte Andree baxtar et Willelmo clerk pro terminis xix annorum

div.p:
Till al and sindry to quhais knawlagis thir present lettres sal to cum Aldirman bailyeis and consaile
of the burgh' of abirdene greting in god wit your' vniuersite ws avysitly til hafe set and to
ferme lattyn and be the tenour' of thir' present lettres settis and to ferme lattys our' nethir' mylne'
of the saide burgh' with the pertinens with' al fredomys custummys and dowyteis aucht and wont
till our' luffit nichtburis Androw baxtar and William clerk baxtar and to thair' assignays for
the termys of nyntene' yeris fullely and continualy fra the date of the making of thir' present
lettres to be compleit and runnyne but ony interrupcione // the forsaide Androw and Willam and
thair' assignays payande til ws for the ferme of the saide mylne' yerely ten' markis of
The vsuale payment of scotlande proporcionaly at twa vsuale termys of the term yer' that is
to say Witsonday and martymes in wynter be evinly porcionis // the entre of the saide Androw
And Willam in the tak of the forsaide nethir' mylne' with the pertinens at the fest of Witsonday
next and immediate eftir folowande the date of the making of thir' present lettres of frathine
furth' to bruke and Joys' the tak of the saide mylne' pessabilly for the saide ferme
yerely payande in maner' and forme' befor' expremyt quhill the forsaide nyntene yeris
be fullely compleit and runnyne / thar' atour' the saide aldirman bailyeis and consaile sal
alow and strek of to the saide Androw and Willam and thair' assignays in thair' erast martymes
maile a merk of siluer to the reparacione and bigging of the saide mylne' and to deliuer to
thaim the tymmer to big the scuyle and to ger' Rede the louch' for the passage of the watir'
to the clous' als oft as it nedis indurande thair' termys forsaide and that thai sall hafe
the watir fre to grynde all tyme but stopping of the malaris of the vuir'mylne And
the forsaide Androw and William and thair' assignays ar oblist and bundyn til ws to reparale
reforme and big the saide mylne' with the pertinens and to deliuer the saide mylne' at the
vsche of thair' saide termys honestly sufficiandely and profitabilly reparalit and biggit in al
thingis necessar' alswele vtuth' as enuthe be the sicht of discret' personys to be chosin
be ws be al thair' landis and gudis movabill' and vnmovabill' in the strataste stile and
forme of obligacione And gif at the vsche of the saide termys it be sene' til ws that the
saide mylne' be costlik and profitable' aparalit and biggit and mendyt we sal set the saide
mylne' with the pertinens to the forsaide Androw and William and to thair' assignays beande
for the tym befor' ony vthir' for sic like price as scho is worth' in the tym but fraude
or gile And we the forsaide aldirman bailyeis and consaile sal warande kepe ande
defende the fornemnyt tak of the forsaide nethir' mylne' with the pertinens to the forsaide
Androw and William and to thair' assignays in all forme' and effect befor' expremyt agayn
nis all dedely to the vsche of thair' termys of nyntene' yeris fornemnyt lelely and trew
ly but fraude or gile In witnes of the quhilk thing to thir' present lettres we hafe appen
syt our' commone sele at the burgh' of Abirdene the xxviij day of maij the yer' of our'
lorde a thousande hour' hundreth sexty and acht yeris

head.foreign: Copia littere assedacionis superioris molendini facte Duncano allone' et gelis molendinario pro terminis nouendecim annorum

div.p:
Till al and sindri to quhais knawlage thir present lettres sal to cum Aldirman bailyeis consale and communite of
the burgh' of Abirdene greting in god wtt wit your' vniuersite ws awisitly til hafe set and to ferme'
lattyyn and be the tenour' of thir' present lettres settis and to ferme lattis oure vuyr' mylne' of the saide
burgh' with the pertinens with al fredomys custumys and dowiteis aucht and wont til our' luffit nicht
buris Duncane allone' and gelis mylnar' and to thair' assignays for the termys of xix yeris fulle
ly and continualy fra the date of the making of thir present lettres to be compleit and runnyn but ony interrup
cione / The forsaide Duncane and gelis and thair' assignais payande til ws for ferme of the said'
mylne' yerely xxti merkis of the vsuale payment of scotlande proporcionaly at twa vsuale ter
mys of the yer' that is to say Witsonday and martymes in wynter be ewinly porcionis // the
entre of the forsaide Duncane and gelis in the tak of the forsaide vuir mylne' with the pertinens at the
fest of Witsonday next and immediate eftir folowande the date of the making of thir' present lettres
and frathin furth to bruke and Joys' the tak of the saide mylne' pessabill' for the saide ferme
yerely payande in maner and forme befor' expremit quhil the forsaide xix yeris be fullely com
pleit and runnyn And thar atour' the saide aldirman bailyeis and consaile sal alow and streke of to the
saide Duncan and gelis and thair' assignays in thair' erast martymes maile twa merkis of siluer
to the reparacione and bigging of the saide mylne' / and to deliuer to thaim the tymmer to big the scuyle and
to ger' red' the louch' for the passage of the watir to the clous' als oft as it nedis indurand'
thair' termys forsaide and that thai sal hafe watir fre to grynde al tym but stopping of the
malaris of the nethir' mylne' And the forsaide Duncane and gelis and thair' assignays as oblist
and bundyn til ws to raparale refourme and big the saide mylne with the pertinens and to deliuer the
saide mylne' at the vsche of thair' saide termys honestly sufficiandely and profitabilly raparalit
and biggit in al thingis necessar' alswele vtuth' as enuthe' be the sycht of discret personis
to be chosyn be ws be al thair' landis and gudis movabill' and vnmovabill' in the stratast' stile
and forme' of obligacione // And gif at the vsche of the saide termys it be sene' til ws that the
saide mylne' be costlik and profitabile aparalit biggit and mendyt we sal set the saide mylne'
with the pertinens to the forsaide Duncane and gelis and to thair' assignays beande for the tyme
befor ony vthiris for sic like price as scho is worth' in the tyme but fraude or gile / And
we the forsaide aldirman bailyeis and consaile sal warande kepe and defende the fornemnyt
tak of the forsaide vuir mylne' with the pertinens to the forsaide Duncane and gelis and to thair' assig
nays in all forme' and effect befor' expremyt agayn al dedely to the vsche of thair' termys of
xix yeris fornemnyt lelely and trewly but fraude or gile In witnes of the quhilk thing
to thir present lettres we hafe appensit oure commone sele at the burgh of abirdene the xxviij
day of maij the yer' of our' lorde a thousande four' hundreth sexty and acht yeris

div.head: Copia vnius carte Johannis filius henrici de culan de vna ara terre arabilis //
div.p:
Omnibus hanc Cartam visuris vel audituris dominus Robertus filius patricij capellanus
salutem in domino sempiternam Noueritis me dedisse concessisse ac omnino et imperpetuum a
me et heredibus meis vendidisse Johanni filio henrici dicto culan burgensis de abirdene
vnam acram terre arabilis Jacente infra territorium de Rubbislaw ex parte occidentali de
ly Rubbislaw inter terram Johannis de Kyntor ex parte orientali ex parte vna et terram
Willelmi scherar' ex parte occidentali ex parte altera viam regiam ex parte australi et croftum
de ly hardewerde ex parte boriali pro quadam summa peciem quam dictus Johannes in mea
vrgenti necessitate plenarie pre manibus per soluebat de qua teneo me bene contentum et
solutum Tenendam et habendam totam et integram predictam acram terre arabilis dicto
Johanni heredibus suis et suis assignatis a me heredibus meis et meis assignatis
imperpetuum libere quiete plenarie integre et honorate bene et in pace cum omnibus commodi
tatibus libertatibus et aysiamentis ac iustis suis pertinenciis quibuscumque ad dictam acram terre
arabilis spectan' seu iuste spectare valen' quomodolibet in futurum Reddendo inde
annuatim domino vel dominis de Rubbislaw vnum denarium vsualis monete scocie nomine
albe firme ad festum sancti Johannis baptiste si petatur tantum pro omni alio seruicio seculari ex
actione seu demanda que de dicta acra terre arabilis cum pertinenciis aliqualiter exigi
peterunt aut Requiri Et ego vero predictus dominus Robertus capellanus et heredes mei
totam predictam acram terre arabilis cum pertinenciis prefato Johanni et heredibus suis et suis
assignatis contra omnes mortales warandisabimus acquietabimus et imperpetuum
defendemus In cuius Rei testimonium huic presenti carte mee sigillum meum est
appensum vna cum sigillo patricij de fyfe tunc vnius balliuorum dicti burgi ac da
toris saysine predicto Johanni de predicta acra terre arabilis per tradicionem terre et lapidis
eiusdem apud abirdene octauo die mensis marcij Anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo xlo
septimo / testibus Willelmo scherar' tunc preposito dicti burgi Johanne de fyfe Johanne
de marr' Johanne de scrogis patre Johanne de scrogis filio thoma blindsele gilberto
meignes Andrea de culan Johanne de culan Andrea ancroft patricio de badenach'
et Willelmo atkinson' seriando cum multis alijs

div.head:
Subscripti sunt electi ad taxandum summam promissam domino nostro Regi ad expellendum
custumam salmonum vsque ad etatem perfectam domini nostri Regis
div.p:
Andreas alanson
Ricardus de Kintor
Alexander blindsele
Dauid colyson'
Dauid simson'
Johannes mathouson'
Walterus moryson'
Ranaldus tailyour'

div.head: Copia littere Willelmi Ratte
div.p:
Omnibus hanc cartam visuris vel audituris prepositus ballivi consules et communitas burgi de Abirdene
salutem in domini sempiternam Noueritis nos vnanum consensu et assensu dedisse et concessisse
et hoc presenti scripto nostro confirmasse dilecto nostro Willelmo Rate musico officium et seruicium clerici
parrochiali ecclesie beati nicholaij dicti burgi cum pertinenciis eiusdem vna cum officio et seruicio sacriste dicte
ecclesie et suis pertinenciis pro suis bonis seruicijs et administracionibus futuris temporibus impendendis
Tenendis et habendis totum et integrum officium et seruicium clerici parochiali antedictum necnon seruicium et
officium sacriste tocius dicte ecclesie supra dictum dicto Willelmo de nobis et successoribus nostris pro toto
tempore vite sue cum omnibus libertatibus commoditatibus et aysiamentis ac iustis suis pertinenciis quibus
cumque ad dicta officia et seruicia spectan spectan' seu aliqualiter iuste spectare valen' quomodolibet
in futurum Adeo libere et quiete plenarie integre honorate bene et in pace omnibus et per omnia
sicut antequis predicta officia et seruicia aut aliquod predictorum coniuctim coniunctim vel seperatim preteritis
temporibus honorificencius quiecius aut integrius tenuit vel possedit sine impedimento
aut condicione aliquibus temporibus futuris faciend' pro quibus quidam officijs et seruicijs supradictis
dictus Willelmus iuxta omnimodo posse suum in dicta ecclesia seruicia beneuola debita faciet et con
sueta sibi quia pro sustentacione et amplicacione diuini cultus in melius reformandj tres alios
choristas ad diuinum obsequium sufficientes et habiles sustentand' Inueniet complices vel
ministros per nos et succesores nostros cum eosdem administracioni huiusmodi eligi contigerit ele
gendos dicto quia Willelmo in administracione et deseruicione officiorum et seruicio et cetera huiusmodi aut alicuius
eorundem racionabilem se habente et hituro habituro pro toto tempore vite sue vt premittit durature
In quorum omnium et singulorum fidem et testimonium premissorum Sigillum communione dicti burgi presentibus
duximus appendend' apud dictum burgum duodecimo die mensis septembris Anno Domini Mmo
quadringentesimo sexagesimo septimo /

Jamys be the grace of god king of scottis til the aldirman and bailyeis of our' burgh of Abirdene
greting for alsmekil as we haf writtyn diuers' and mony tymys to yow be the decret and de
liuerans of the lordis of our' consaile to devoyde and rede a certan lande and tenement lyande
within oure saide burgh' to oure louyt Agnes lilburne' and Johne' chapman hir' spous'
And as yeit ye hafe done' nocht thar'to in dissobeying of oure saide lettres mandement and
chargis and in gret lichtlying and contemnyng of oure auctorite and mageste Oure will
is and we charge yow thar' ffor' strately and commawndis yeit as of befor' ye pas' to
the saide lande and tenement and that ye furthwith devoyde and Red' the samyn to the
saidis agnes and Johne' chapman hir saide spous' or to thair' factouris of al personys
and gudis inhabitande the saide tenement and that ye halde woyde and red' to thaim And
that ye kep mantene supple and defende the saidis agnes and hir' saide spous' in the
brukyn and Joysing of the saide tenement eftir' the tenour' of oure vthir' lettres direct to
yow tharuppon' vndir al the hiest payn and charge ye may committ and Jurnie agayn oure ma
ieste in that part deliueryng thir' oure lettres be yow deuly execut and indorsit as afferis
again to the berar' gevin vndir oure signet at fauulklande the viij day of August and
of oure Regne' the tent yer' /
ex deliberacione dominorum consilij

Jamys be the grace of god king of scottis to our' Aldirman and bailyeis of our' burgh /
of Abirdene greting fforalsmekile as we hafe gevin to our' louyt Jamys hervy and his
airis a tenement lyande within our' saide burgh with the pertinens pertenyng til ws throw
resone' of bastardry be the decess' of henry hervy bastarde and Androw his son' as
is contenyt in the saide Jamys chartir made til him tharuppon' Our' will is and we charge
yow stratly and commawndis that thir' our' lettres sene' but delay ye ger' Rede and wode the
saide tenement to the saide Jamys and kep him and his tenandis vnuexit and distrub'
thar'in alsfer' as law will vndir all payn and charge that eftir may folow deliuering
thir' our' lettres be yow sene' and execut agayn to the berrar' gevin vndir our' signet
at Edinburgh the xxiij day of Januar' and of our' Regne the tende yer'
Jamys

div.head: Copia littere assedacionis de sexta parte de le crois concesse gilberto de Kyntor /
div.p:
Beit made kende til al men be thir' present lettres ws aldirman balyeis consaile and communite
of the burgh' of abirdene with hale consent and assent our' profitis in that part avysitly
befor sene' for a certan some of monee to be giffin to the queyn in propine til haf set
and to formaile lattyn and be the tenour' of thir lettres settis and to formaile lattyn til oure
luffit gilbert of Kyntor burges of the saide burgh' of abirdene til his airis and assignays
the sext part of our' watir of the crois of the watir of Done' for the termys of xiij yeris
entirande in the xviij day of the moneth' of nouembir the yer' of our' lorde Mmo ccccmo lxxto
and four' yeris fullely and continualy to be compleit and runnyn frathin to be haldin and to be
hade the forsaide sext part of the saide watir of the crois with' the pertinens to the saide gilbert /
his airis and assignays with al profitis fredomys and aysiamentis for all the termys of xiij
yeris forsaide fre but ony maile payande til ws except alanerly xx s' to be payit till
ws in the last yer' of the fornemnyt xiij y'y' overwrites s'. eris And thar' atour' we the saide aldirman bail
yeis consaile and communite of the saide burgh' for the thankfull payment made til ws be the
saide gilbert of the saide some' of monee giffin to the queyne in propine til hafe set and to
maile lattyn to the saide gilbert his airis and assignays the forsaide sext part of our' watir
of the croys with' the pertinens for the termys of four' yeris next and immediate thareftir fullely
to compleit and runnyne for the penny maile that it payis now to be payit til ws yerely and
termely but ony grissome' And mar' atour' quhat takis the saide gilbert has of ony watiris of
ws of befor' in assedacione at the vsche of his termys he his airis or assignays sal ramayn
with that watiris on ramovit and hafe it for sic lik male and grissome as nichtburis and vthiris
payis till ws and gif it hapnys the saide gilbert his airis or assignays to bruke and Joys'
nocht the forsaide tak of the saide watir of the croys or ony part of it for the termys of xiij
yeris befor' expremyt we oblis' and bindis ws to content and pay yerely to the saide gilbert his
airis or assignays acht hamburgh barellis of salmunde full rede and swete for the fisching'
of the saide sext part of the croys with the pertinens befor' expremyt And we the forsaidis
aldirman bailyeis consaile and communite of the saide burgh' oblis' and bindis ws to warande
kepe and defende agayn al dedely the assedacione of the saide sext part of the watir of the
croys with the pertinens to the saide gilbert his airis and assignays for all the termys and
yeris in maner and forme' befor expremyt lelely and trewely but fraude or gile In witnes
of the quhilk thing to thir present lettres we haf gert appens' our' common sele at our' said'
burgh' of abirdene the xxiiij day of the moneth' of Julij the yer' of our' lorde a thou
sande four' hundreth' and sewinty yeris

div.head: Copia littere assedacionis concesse Dauid colyson' de dimidia Reth' de le mydchingile et cetera
Copia carte Johannis Irwine
div.p:
Omnibus hanc cartam visuris vel audituris burgenses et communitas burgi de Abirdene salutem in domino
sempiternam Noueritis nos vnanum conssensu et assensu vtilitate nostra in hac parte vndique preuisa et
diligenter considerata dedisse concessisse et hac presenti carta nostra confirmasse dilecto et speciali
nostro Johanni de Irwine comburgensi nostro totam illam peciem terre nostram Jacentem extra portam austra
lem vici castri inter vias regias quibus itur ad montem castri ex parte boriali ex vna et ad le futy
ex parte australi partibus ex altera prout extendit in longitudine a dicta via regia qua itur ad
le futy versus occidens continens triginta duas vlnas versus oriens Tenendam et habendam totam et integram
terram predictam cum pertinenciis prefato Johanni heredibus suis et suis assignatis de nobis et successoribus
nostris in feodo et hereditate cum debitis longitudine et latitudine ac cum omnibus alijs et singulis como
ditatibus libertatibus et aysiamentis ac iustis suis pertinenciis quibuscumque ad predictam terram spectan' seu
iuste spectare valen' aliqualiter in futuris libere et quiete plenarie integre honorate bene et in pace
sine aliqua reuocacione Reclamacione aut contradictione nostri aut successorum nostrorum seu aliorum quorumcumque nomine
nostro vel ex parte nostra inde quouismodo futuris temporibus facienda Reddendo inde annuatim predictus
Johannes heredes sue et sui assignati domino nostro regi et heredibus suis seruicium debitum et consuetum
ac eciam prefatus Johannes heredes sui et sui assignati tenebunt et conseruabunt nobis et successoribus
nostris annuatim et in dies predictas vias regias quibus itur vt premittitur ad montem castri et ad le futy
honestas mundas et immaculatas ab omni putredine in futuram tantum pro omni alio seruicio seculari exac
cione vel demanda que de predicta pecie terre cum pertinenciis per nos aut successores nostros aliqualiter
exigi poterit aut requiri Et nos vero predicti burgenses et communitas burgi antedicti et successores
nostri totam peciem terre predictam cum pertinenciis prefato Johanni de Irwine heredibus suis et suis assignatis
iuxta tenorem vinj et effectum presentis carte nostre in omnibus et per omnia vt premittitur contra omnes
mortales warandisabimus acquietabimus et fideliter imperpetuum defendemus In cuius rei testimo
nium huic presenti carte nostre sigillum nostrum communione dicti burgi apponi fecimus vna cum sigillo
prouidj viri Johannis Waus' vnius balliuorum dicti burgi ac saysine datoris prefato Johanni de
predicta pecie terre cum pertinenciis per nos causa maioris huius rei euidencie procurat' apud dictum
burgum de aberdene' decimo septimo die mensis Junij Anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo
septuagesimo primo Insuper si predictus Johannes de Irwine heredes quia sui aut sui assignati
fuerunt conuicti tribus vicibus per prepositum et balliuos pro custodia dictarum viarum non honeste vt
premittitur conseruatarum pro quibuslibet tribus vicibus sic conuictis satisfacient pro forisfacto dictis
preposito et balliuis qui pro tempore fuerunt duodecim denarios totiens quotiens ipse aut ipsi
pro causa premissa fuerunt per eosdem conuicti sine remissone quacumque Coram hiis testibus Ricar
do de Kintor Johanne de marr' alexandro de camera Johanne de scrogis alexandro meignes Johanne
de Knollis Dauid colyson' Andrea scherar' Dauid simson' thoma de camera Johanne Waus'
patricio de badenache et alexandro blindsele balliuis burgi predicti cum multis et diuersis alijs

xxiiijto die mensis septembris anno Domini et cetera lxixno comparuit Dauid menyes coram preposito et quadam
parte de communi consilio et assignauit aquam suam de crois pro terminis suis ipso deficien' agnete menyes
filie sue et constituit Jonetam menyes sororem suam tutorem dicte agneti filie sue coram hiis testibus
matheo fechat Dauid colyson' thoma prat Johanne Knollis adam de craufurde Dauid mathouson'
Roberto Wormot thomas de camera et thoma de fyff balliuis

Gilbertus Waus assignauit aquam suam de Raike Alisone giffarde sponse sue in ab
sencia sua pro omnibus suis terminis coram Andrea alanson' preposito Johanne Waus' thoma
de camera et alexandro blindsele balliuis et alijs diuersis de communi consilio

Decimo quarto die mensis marcij anno Domini et cetera lxxj et cetera alexander of chawmer is oblist
be the fathe of his body til Richarde of Kintor than aldirman and to Dauy colyson' ane
of the bailyeis of the saide burgh that he sal ger' maystir Johne' of chawmer maystir
of saynt thomas hospitale of this burghe being within yer' and day her' eftir'
the mortificacione of the landis of ys belangande the saide hospitale and
schaw it to the aldirman balyeis and consale that sall be for the tyme that beande'
done' the saide aldirman richarde of Kyntor and Dauy colyson sall hafe fre power'
to present the freman to the aldirman and bailyeis quhilkis has grauntyt alde
maystir Johne' for the purchesing of the saide mortificacione
And gif the saide maystir Johne' bringis nocht the saide mortificacione and to
the saide aldirman bailyeis and consale that sall be for the tym witin yer and day as saide
as the saide alexander of chawmer is oblist as of befor' to content and pay to the saide Ri
charde and Dauy the four' merkis that thai hafe payit was pro
myst to the saide maystir Johne' of chawmer for the certane mortificacione /
